attributes.action: Sack Peter Hain   before we sack you .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I know someone who refused £10 in case it influenced his benefit .

No ifs no buts no lies .

rejection.details:
It is difficult to understand the meaning and relevance of your extra details.
It is also difficult to understand the meaning of "we sack you" in the petition title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
